text:
WALANG PASOK: Classes in ALL LEVELS for public schools and work in GOVERNMENT OFFICES are suspended in the City of Manila from from August 23-24, 2022 due to severe tropical storm #FloritaPH per the Office of the Press Secretary.

For your information.

#AlertoManileno #WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Dahil sa nararanasan na sama ng panahon dulot ng bagyong #KristinePH , suspendido ang klase sa LAHAT NG ANTAS sa pampubliko at pribadong paaralan sa Huwebes, October 24, 2024, dahil sa nakataas na Tropical Cyclone Wind Signal No. 2 sa Kalakhang Maynila.

Magsasagawa ng make-up classes bilang kapalit ng mga araw na walang pasok.

Inaanyayaan ang lahat na manatili sa kanilang mga tahanan, maghanda, at mag-ingat. 

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Mayor Honey Lacuna-Pangan declares FACE-TO-FACE classes in ALL LEVELS in public and private schools suspended tomorrow, Tuesday, March 4, 2025.

Schools are advised to shift to any alternative learning modality. 

According to the weather forecast by MDRRMO, Manilaâ€™s heat index will hit a peak of 43Â°C tomorrow. Everyone is advised to take caution. 

#WalangPasok

Ayon sa anunsyo ng Presidential Communications Office (PCO), suspendido ang mga klase sa lahat ng antas sa mga pampubliko at pribadong paaralan, gayundin ang trabaho sa mga tanggapan ng pamahalaan sa mga sumusunod na lugar, bunsod ng inaasahang masamang panahon:

Gayunpaman, ang mga opisina ng Pamahalaang Lungsod ng Maynila na may tungkulin sa paghahatid ng mga pangunahing at mahahalagang serbisyo, tulad ng disaster response, kalusugan, kapayapaan at kaayusan, at iba pang mahahalagang gawain ay magpapatuloy pa rin sa kanilang operasyon upang matiyak ang tuloy-tuloy na serbisyo para sa publiko.

Ang desisyon ukol sa operasyon ng mga pribadong kumpanya at opisina ay ipinauubaya sa kanilang pamunuan.

Pinapayuhan ang lahat na maging maingat, iwasan ang mga mapanganib na lugar, at manatiling nakatutok sa mga opisyal na abiso at update mula sa pamahalaan.

Stay safe, ManileÃ±os!

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan suspends face-to-face and online classes in ALL LEVELS in public and private schools on Monday, September 2, 2024 due to the forecasted rainfall due to Tropical Depression #EntengPH.

Stay safe, Manilans!

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Dahil sa masamang panahon dulot ng bagyong #KristinePH, suspendido ang pasok sa pampubliko at pribadong eskwelahan sa LAHAT NG ANTAS sa Lungsod ng Maynila ngayong Biyernes, October 25, 2024.

Magsasagawa ng make-up classes bilang kapalit ng mga walang pasok.

Mag-iingat po kayo lahat!

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan declares suspension of EVENING CLASSES for private and public schools in ALL LEVELS for today, November 16, 2024 and ALL SUNDAY CLASSES including ROTC, NSTP, and Graduate school classes in public and private colleges and universities on Sunday, November 17, 2024.

This is in precaution due to the forecasted inclement weather brought about by Super Typhoon #PepitoPH per recommendation of Manila DRRM Office.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Suspension of classes in ALL LEVELS in Metro Manila are extended until April 12, 2020 as declared by President Rodrigo Duterte on Thursday, March 12.

#AlertoManileno

WALANG PASOK: As of 11:30AM, tinaas na ng PAG ASA ang Signal no 1 sa Metro Manila dahil sa Bagyong #KristinePH. 

Alinsunod sa Department of Education Order No. 37, Series of 2022, AUTOMATIC na SUSPENDED ang klase sa Kinder hanggang Senior High School sa lahat ng paaralan, pampubliko at pribado, kasama ONLINE CLASSES, kasama ang mga nasa Alternative Learning System (ALS) sa Pamahalaang Lungsod ng Maynila ngayon HAPON. 

Manatili na lang po sa inyong mga tahanan at inaabisuhan ang lahat na mag handa at mag ingat.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan suspends classes in ALL LEVELS in public and private schools for Monday, November 18, 2024.

This is per recommendation of Manila DRRM Office due to the inclement weather brought about by Super Typhoon #PepitoPH

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan suspends face-to-face and online classes for students from daycare until senior high school for Monday, November 11, 2024, based on DepEd Order No. 37 due to the raised Signal No. 1 in the city.

Face-to-Face classes for colleges and universities are likewise suspended in Manila.

Shift to online class for private colleges and universities shall be at the discretion of their school administrators.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Based on the recommendation of Manila DRRM Office, AFTERNOON classes in ALL LEVELS in public and private schools are suspended on Monday, March 3, 2025.

According to the weather forecast by MDRRMO, Manilaâ€™s heat index this morning will range from 36-38Â°C, with peak heat index of 42Â°C to be felt around 2:00PM today.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan announced the suspension of face-to-face classes in elementary and high school levels in private schools due to the yellow rainfall warning by PAGASA.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK: Manila Mayor Dra. Honey Lacuna-Pangan announced the suspension of face-to-face classes in ALL LEVELS in private schools for Wednesday, July 24, 2024, due to the continuous heavy rainfall in the city and as advised by the yellow rainfall warning by PAGASA.

#WalangPasok

WALANG PASOK:  Based on the recommendation of National Disaster Risk Reduction Management Council approved by Executive Secretary Lucas P. Bersamin, classes in ALL LEVELS and work in government offices the City of Manila are hereby suspended today, August 28, 2024, due to the heavy rain and flooding brought about by the Southwest Monsoon.

Departments and agencies providing frontline and emergency services are exempted from the suspension.

Work in private offices is left to the discretion of their management.
